summary: PostAttachmentRenderer was updated to render image attachments inline via (including when MIME is application/octet-stream but filename looks like an image) and to present non-image attachments (video, PDF, and fallback types) as external links opening in a new tab via the direct blob URL. One part of the fallback link is truncated, so compliance for target/rel in that specific branch can’t be fully verified from the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: For any non-image type, the UI shows an external open/download link that opens in a new tab/window with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".
missing_requirements.reason: The fallback (unknown file types) anchor tag is truncated in the diff right after `target="_blank`, so it’s not possible to confirm from the provided evidence that the full target/rel attributes are correctly present for that branch.
